sections.heading: Persons Entitled to Lien; Extent Thereof.Section 29-4-102 - Filing of Lien Statement; Enforcement.
sections.text:
29-4-101. Persons entitled to lien; extent thereof.

(a) Any person who performs any work or furnishes any materials for the construction or improvement of any ditch, canal or reservoir under contract with the owner or his contractor or subcontractor, on complying with W.S. 29-2-101 through 29-2-109, is entitled to a lien for work done or material furnished upon the ditch, canal or reservoir. The lien covers:

(i) The right-of-way for the ditch, canal or reservoir;

(ii) The pertinent water permits and water rights; and

(iii) The reclaimed lands for which the ditch, canal or reservoir was constructed.

sections.heading: Filing of Lien Statement; Enforcement.
sections.text:
29-4-102. Filing of lien statement; enforcement.

Any person entitled may file a lien statement as provided by W.S. 29-1-103 through 29-1-314 and 29-2-101 through 29-2-113 and may enforce his lien in the same manner.
